body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting ABC Car Dealership customer support. My name is Albert Moore. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ashley. Could you please provide me with the last two digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number ends in two four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. And how many times have you visited our dealership, Ashley?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have been to your dealership five times.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that. We truly value your loyalty. Is there anything specific that you would like to discuss or inquire about today, Ashley?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I wanted to inquire about the pricing of the SUV models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I can assist you with that. Thank you for bringing it to my attention. Thank you for your time, Ashley. If you have any further questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us. Have a wonderful day!
